items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick: Will price polish add more shine to this gold stock?
items.description: A better product mix and an increasing share of exports should add glitter to Sky Gold & Diamonds

items.title: New India Assurance gets GST demand notice of Rs 2,298 crore
items.description: The company has received a show cause notice dated June 26, 2025, from the office of Additional Commissioner, Mumbai-South, and Maharashtra state, New India Assurance Company Ltd said

items.title: Elon Musk confidant Omead Afshar leaves Tesla in latest high-level exit
items.description: Afshar joined Tesla in 2017, according to his LinkedIn profile, as the carmaker was beginning to ramp up production of the Model 3 sedan.

items.title: Investors forum urges Devendra Fadnavis to back Rs 1,950 crore settlement plan
items.description: The final hearing at the NCLT is slated for July 11, 2025

items.title: Hindustan Aeronautics announces final dividend of Rs 15 per share for FY25. Check record date
items.description: HAL's revenue was expected to take a hit due to delays in the supply of Tejas Mk 1A light combat aircraft,

items.title: BHEL bags Rs 6,500 crore contract from Adani Power for 6 thermal units
items.description: BHEL is to supply equipment and supervision of erection and commissioning for the six thermal units of 800MW

items.title: How JSW plans to fund acquisition of Akzo Nobel's India unit
items.description: JSW Group is in talks with global lenders to Rs 4,000 crore to fund the deal

items.title: Air India aircraft cleared after non-specific security alert triggers standard checks
items.description: Standard security procedures were duly carried out, and the aircraft has been cleared for the next flight, Air India said in a statement.

items.title: REITs may stretch gains on RBI rate cuts, buoyant leasing of commercial and retail spaces
items.description: The four listed REITs have distributed about 228.18 billion rupees ($2.7 billion) to their investors since listing. More than 262,000 people have invested in REIT as of June 2025 in India, according to the Indian REITs Association website.

items.title: IDBI Bank disinvestment: How much of it is in the price?
items.description: A potential disinvestment deal has triggered a rally in IDBI Bank. The real attraction will be IDBI Bank’s huge deposits of over Rs 300,000 crore, as of March 2025 end

items.title: VVDN eyes strategic shift with $100 million investment push into defence, auto and laptop manufacturing
items.description: The company is also betting big on defence, with growing work around radio frequency (RF), vision, and AI technologies, and drones. Some products have already reached the commercial rollout stage.
